dct_title_s: Verkehrskarte von Europa, Nord-Afrika und dem Morgenlande
dct_alternative_sm: Traffic map of Europe, North Africa and the Morganland
dct_description_sm: Bearbeitet mit besonderer Berücksichtigung der Deutschen Interessen von Paul Langhans. Gotha : Justus Perthes.
Trade flag and ship flag illustrations in margins, 47 inset maps of city areas (under 4 headings).
Shows various land and sea routes, wetlands/marshland, salt swamps, waterways, German and foreign steamship companies, German and Austria consulates, telegraph lines.

"Die Pläne der Umschlagplätze Mittel-europa befinden sich auf der Verkehrskarte von Mittel-Europa von demselben Verfasser" = [The plans for Central European transhipment centers are on the circulation map of Central Europe by the same author].
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
